title: Bittiolum alternatum
text:
Bittiolum alternatum is a <a href="species">species</a> of <a href="sea%20snail">sea snail</a>, a marine <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a> in the <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Cerithiidae">Cerithiidae</a>.
Description.
The maximum recorded <a href="gastropod%20shell">shell</a> length is 8.3 mm.
Habitat.
The minimum recorded depth for this species is 0 m, maximum recorded depth is 37 m.
